item.title: 日本央行将在美联储前数小时决定利率
item.description: 2024年6月14日星期五，日本东京，日本央行行长上田一夫在央行总部举行的新闻发布会上。日本央行让投资者等到7月份的会议上再了解缩减购债规模的细节，这引发日元再度走软，并推低了加息押注。摄影师：Kiyoshi Ota/Bloomberg【原文：Kazuo Ueda, governor of the Bank of Japan (BOJ), during a news conference at the central bank's headquarters in Tokyo, Japan, on Friday, June 14, 2024. The Bank of Japan is making investors wait until its July meeting for details on its paring of bond buying, sparking renewed weakness in the yen and a pushing back of bets on an interest rate hike. Photographer: Kiyoshi Ota/Bloomberg】

item.title: 中国任命新市场副主席接替改革派方星海
item.description: 中国任命了一位新官员担任市场监管机构副主任，接替长期倡导改革和开放资本市场的方星海。【原文：China has appointed a new official as deputy chief at its markets regulator to replace Fang Xinghai, a long-time advocate for reform and open capital markets.】

item.title: 中国人民银行即将出售债券，中国地区银行面临债券逆转风险
item.description: 在今年史无前例的债券大涨引发央行发出一系列警告之后，中国的地区贷款机构在中国 4.3 万亿美元的主权债务市场上正面临着越来越大的风险。【原文：China’s regional lenders are facing growing risks in the nation’s $4.3 trillion sovereign debt market after an unprecedented bond rally this year prompted a slew of warnings from the central bank.】

item.title: 出口繁荣、美联储转向，林吉特将加速好转
item.description: 得益于强劲的经济增长和对美联储即将降息的预期，马来西亚林吉特的反弹步伐正在加快。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit’s rebound is gathering pace, thanks to stronger growth and expectations of an impending interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 末日博士 "努里埃尔-鲁比尼希望推出首只 ETF
item.description: 经济学家努里埃尔-鲁比尼（Nouriel Roubini）因在 2008 年金融危机前发出灾难警告而赢得了 "末日博士 "的称号，他正期待着成为最新一位在 9.4 万亿美元的 ETF 领域大显身手的华尔街资深人士。【原文：Economist Nouriel Roubini, who earned the “Dr. Doom” moniker for his warnings of disaster ahead of the 2008 financial crisis, is looking to become the latest high-profile Wall Street veteran to make their mark in the $9.4 trillion ETF universe.】

item.title: 新加坡镍丑闻清算人寻求收回 8.55 亿新元：ST
item.description: 据《海峡时报》（Straits Times）报道，涉嫌镍矿诈骗犯吴裕智（Ng Yu Zhi）旗下三家公司的清算人正在寻求法院命令，以从吴裕智及其他三人手中追回约 8.55 亿新元（约合 6.37 亿美元）。【原文：The liquidators of alleged nickel fraudster Ng Yu Zhi’s three companies are seeking a court order to recover about S$855 million ($637 million) from Ng and three others, the Straits Times reported.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。微软令人失望哈里斯抹去了特朗普在摇摆州的领先优势。英特尔正在裁员。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Microsoft disappoints. Harris wipes out Trump’s lead in swing states. And Intel is cutting jobs. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 中国企业盈利复苏蹒跚，考验投资者信心
item.description: 对于中国股票投资者来说，当前的财报季正在成为又一个令人失望的季节，削弱了低迷市场出现转机的可能性。【原文：The current earnings season is shaping up to be another letdown for Chinese stock investors, eroding the case for a turnaround in the slumping market.】

item.title: 行业报告显示美国再次削减石油库存后，石油价格上涨
item.description: 在一份行业报告指出美国原油库存连续第五周减少后，石油价格在四个交易日中首次上涨。【原文：Oil rose for the first time in four session after an industry report pointed to a fifth week of drawdowns in US crude stockpiles.】

item.title: 日元在日本央行和美联储之前保持 2022 年以来最大月度涨幅
item.description: 日元保持着一年半以来的最大月度涨幅，投资者翘首以待央行周三的决定，这些决定可能延续涨势，也可能使涨势逆转。【原文：The yen held onto its biggest monthly gain in a year-and-a-half as investors waited on tenterhooks for central bank decisions Wednesday that may extend the rally or send it into reverse.】

item.title: 世茂与时代中国在债务计划谈判中重返法庭
item.description: 中国开发商世茂集团控股有限公司（Shimao Group Holdings Ltd.）和时代中国控股有限公司（Times China Holdings Ltd.）周三将在香港出庭受审，两家公司都希望证明自己在债务重组方面取得了足够的进展，从而避免被法院下达清盘令。【原文：Chinese developers Shimao Group Holdings Ltd. and Times China Holdings Ltd. head to court in Hong Kong Wednesday, where they will each aim to show that they have made enough progress on debt restructuring to avoid liquidation orders.】

item.title: 日本央行决议前日本股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 随着日本央行启动一系列备受关注的全球政策会议，日本股市将出现下跌。全球最大的科技公司在美国尾盘扩大了跌幅，原因是人们担心人工智能的狂热可能已经过头。【原文：Stocks in Japan are set to decline as the nation’s central bank kicks off a closely watched series of global policy meetings. The world’s largest technology companies extended losses in late US hours on concerns the artificial-intelligence frenzy might have gone too far.】

item.title: 力拓上半年利润走高，尽管中国市场面临困境
item.description: 作为全球最大的铁矿石开采商，力拓集团上半年基本利润大幅增长，摆脱了中国经济放缓和房地产危机对炼钢材料造成的压力。【原文：Rio Tinto Group’s first-half underlying profit edged higher as the world’s biggest iron ore miner shrugged a period when the steelmaking material was under pressure from China’s economic slowdown and property crisis.】

item.title: 高盛价值自 2020 年以来首次超过摩根士丹利
item.description: 自大流行病肆虐以来，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：For the first time since the throes of the pandemic, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is worth more than its longtime Wall Street rival Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 据说特种建筑产品公司将在首次公开募股中寻求 7.5 亿美元的投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乔丹公司支持的特种建筑产品公司正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集高达 7.5 亿美元的资金，并已向美国证券交易委员会秘密提交了申请。【原文：Jordan Co.-backed Specialty Building Products is seeking to raise as much as $750 million in an initial public offering and has filed confidentially with the US Securities and Exchange Commission, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空将忠诚计划视为潜在的抵押品来源
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways Corp. ）首席财务官周二表示，如果该公司要在债务资本市场上寻求融资，其忠诚度计划可以作为抵押品的来源，并补充说，该公司正在寻求 "尽快 "解决可转换债券到期问题。【原文：JetBlue Airways Corp.’s loyalty program could be a source of collateral if the airline were to pursue financing in the debt capital markets, its chief financial officer said on Tuesday, adding that it is looking to address convertible maturities “as quickly as possible.”】

item.title: 共和党人称哈里斯为边境沙皇。她到底在移民事务中扮演什么角色？
item.description: 卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）有可能成为民主党提名的美国总统候选人，这促使共和党重新开始攻击她作为拜登政府 "边境沙皇 "的表现。众议院议长迈克-约翰逊称她 "无能"。众议院共和党人投票谴责她 "未能确保 "边境安全，并有六名民主党人加入了这项象征性的决议。【原文：Kamala Harris’ ascent as the likely Democratic nominee for US president spurred a revival of the Republican attack on her performance as the Biden administration’s “border czar.” House Speaker Mike Johnson called her “inept” in that role. House Republicans voted to condemn her “failure to secure” the border and got six Democrats to join the symbolic resolution.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州飓风有可能使州立再保险公司的储备金化为乌有
item.description: 更频繁的大西洋飓风有可能增加佛罗里达州的财产损失，迫使该州支持的再保险公司出售更多债务以满足承保需求。【原文：More frequent Atlantic hurricanes threaten to increase property damages in Florida — forcing the state-backed reinsurance provider to sell more debt to meet coverage demands.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 Tenable 正在探索潜在的出售方案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着网络安全领域交易的升温，Tenable Holdings Inc.【原文：Tenable Holdings Inc. is exploring options including a potential sale after receiving takeover interest, according to people familiar with the matter, as dealmaking in the cybersecurity sector heats up.】

item.title: 高盛将出售与 20 亿美元私人基金贷款相关的 SRT
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is selling a bond that will help it offload risk from a portfolio of about $2 billion of loans, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 马耳他的斯奇鲁纳已向欧洲央行询问是否可以在案件审理期间让位
item.description: 马耳他政府发表声明称，马耳他央行行长爱德华-斯奇鲁纳（Edward Scicluna）已向欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）提出申请，要求在一桩针对他的法庭诉讼案尚未结案期间让出行长职位。【原文：Malta’s central bank chief, Edward Scicluna, has submitted a request to European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde asking to step aside from his role as governor while a court case against him is pending, according to a statement from Malta’s government.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚在预计两年后开始使用近海天然气
item.description: 厄瓜多尔石油公司（Ecopetrol SA）预计，从哥伦比亚加勒比海水域开采的天然气最快将于 2029 年投产，这比之前的预期晚了两年，无法及时遏制迫在眉睫的燃料短缺问题。【原文：Ecopetrol SA expects natural gas from Colombia’s Caribbean waters to come online as soon as 2029, two years later than previously anticipated and not in time to curb a looming fuel shortfall.】

item.title: 中国市场持续疲软，欧莱雅销售额增长令人失望
item.description: 欧莱雅公司（L'Oréal SA）报告称，由于中国市场的疲软，这家全球最大的美容产品生产商第二季度的销售额增长乏力。【原文：L’Oréal SA reported sluggish sales growth for the second quarter as the world’s biggest maker of beauty products suffered from weakness in China.】

item.title: 债券销售激增，债务基金经理打包笔记本度假
item.description: 今年夏天，企业在美国债市大举借贷，促使资金经理们在这个历来平静的季节里外出度假时带上笔记本电脑。【原文：Companies have been borrowing heavily in US debt markets this summer, spurring money managers to pack their laptops when they head out on vacation during what was historically a quiet time of year.】

item.title: 飞机交付量下降，空客盈利放缓
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）在第二季度的营业利润下降了一半以上，原因是该公司在航天部门计入了一笔费用，迫使其在飞机交付量低于预期的情况下削减成本。【原文：Airbus SE’s operating profit fell by more than half in the second quarter after the company booked a charge at its space unit, forcing it to cut costs amid lower-than-anticipated aircraft deliveries.】

item.title: 监狱电话公司 ViaPath 在新的 FCC 规则出台后完成 13.8 亿美元的债务出售
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（Federal Communications Commission）出台新规定，限制了监狱通信服务提供商的通话费用，ViaPath Technologies 公司在暂时停止交易后，完成了价值 13.8 亿美元的再融资交易。【原文：ViaPath Technologies has completed a $1.38 billion refinancing transaction after temporarily pausing the process following new regulations from the Federal Communications Commission that curtail how much the prison-communications provider can charge for calls.】

item.title: BlueBay 筹集 3 亿美元，发展新兴市场私人信贷业务
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行蓝湾资产管理公司（RBC BlueBay Asset Management）正加倍努力，进军新兴市场私人借贷。【原文：RBC BlueBay Asset Management is doubling down on its push into emerging-market private lending.】

item.title: 英国南方水务公司面临被穆迪降至 "垃圾 "级的风险
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）正在考虑将英国公用事业公司南方水务公司（Southern Water）的高级债务评级下调至垃圾级，这是泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）的麻烦可能蔓延到该国水务行业其他部门的最新迹象。【原文：Moody’s Ratings is considering a downgrade to junk for the senior debt of UK utility Southern Water, the latest sign that troubles at Thames Water could spill over into other parts of the country’s water sector.】

item.title: 英国在业界抗议声中提高北海石油和天然气税
item.description: 英国新政府兑现了加强北海油气生产商税收制度的承诺，提高了暴利税，并取消了部分投资津贴。【原文：The new UK government followed through on its pledge to toughen up the tax regime for North Sea oil and gas producers, increasing a windfall levy and ending some investment allowances.】

item.title: 隐形的 "特朗普交易 "让一度沉睡的 ETF 重获新生，资产增加
item.description: 两只追踪美国制造投资主题的ETF悄然聚集资产，反映出投资者坚信国内制造业将在下届总统政府中蓬勃发展。【原文：A pair of under-the-radar ETFs tracking made-in-America investment themes are quietly gathering assets, reflecting investor conviction that domestic manufacturing will thrive in the next presidential administration.】
